posts.post_title: FS: Some Graded Offbacks - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have some graded offbacks available. Price includes tracked shipping. Will consider trades for PSA graded EPDGs for my set, so if you any available, just let me know.

Available via PM to discuss.

Thanks!
Jeff

$SOLD Willis batting Tolstoi PSA 2.5
$SOLD Willis throwing Piedmont fact 42 PSA 2
$SOLD Pelty horizontal Hindu PSA 1
$SOLD Kisinger EPDG PSA 4
